about_the_game:
ROGLE is the classic game of Wordle with a mix of rogue-like elements, that increases in difficulty as you succeed. As you play, you will gain abilities that will increase your chances of finding the word while the wordle gets harder to solve and you challenge enemies that will attempt to stop you.

Classic wordle gameplay:
You enter in a word and see, based on the colors, how correct you are. Test your vocabulary or perhaps learn new words as you play!

Rogue-Like:
As you correctly guess words you will be able to select abilities that will aid you as the game progressively gets harder. How far can you go!

name: ROGLE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, recommended dedicated graphics card with 2GB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: none
  • VR Support: no
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, recommended dedicated graphics card with 4GB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • VR Support: no

short_description: ROGLE is the classic game of Wordle with a mix of rogue-like elements, that increases in difficulty as you succeed. As you play, you will gain abilities that will increase your chances of finding the word while the difficulty increases and you challenge enemies that will attempt to stop you.
